definition: thread/string/wire/line/CL:條|条[tiao2],股[gu3],根[gen1]/(after a number) tier (unofficial ranking of a Chinese city)

sentences.english: Top roller covers are only one small link in the complex chain of yarn manufacture.
sentences.chinese: 上羅拉皮圈是複雜的紗線生產流程中一個很小的環節。

sentences.english: Textured yarn nes, of artificial filaments, not put up for retail sale.
sentences.chinese: 其他變形紗線，人造纖維長絲紡制，非供零售用。

sentences.english: Spinning wool fibers into yarns requires some special procedures.
sentences.chinese: 將羊毛紡製成紗線需要一些特殊的工序。

sentences.english: This simple analysis holds only for two-ply yarns.
sentences.chinese: 這些簡單的分析只適合於由兩根單紗合股成的紗線。

sentences.english: The problem of rewinding of yarn from pot to stationery bobbin is also studied.
sentences.chinese: 本文最後並研究退繞時的紗線張力及沮繞速度問題。

sentences.english: The result is a contactless working measuring device, which uses electro static charges on the yarn.
sentences.chinese: 其原理是利用紗線上的靜電荷進行非接觸測量。

sentences.english: The electromagnetic-hysteresis yarn tensioning device was discussed in this article.
sentences.chinese: 對電磁式磁滯紗線張力器進行分析研究。

sentences.english: The relations between yarns and packages in weaving and knitting are described.
sentences.chinese: 描述了機織和針織過程中紗線和筒子的關係。

sentences.english: In the future, this will help spinning mills to adapt the spinning cans more efficiently to the yarn range produced.
sentences.chinese: 將來，這將有助於紡紗廠生產紗線時有效地利用條筒。

sentences.english: The main products of our company are indigo-dyed bobbin and knitted jean fabric collection.
sentences.chinese: 我公司主要產品爲靛藍筒子紗線和針織牛仔系列面料。

sentences.english: A simple test method used to measure relationship between wicking height and time has been described.
sentences.chinese: 使用一種簡單的方法測定紗線芯吸高度與時間的關係。

sentences.english: Another method for making floor coverings involves tying pieces of yarn onto the warp.
sentences.chinese: 地板鋪裝的另一種方法涉及到經搭售紗線。

sentences.english: This paper analyses the effect of twist on soil retention of cleaning cloth through a experiment.
sentences.chinese: 通過試驗分析了紗線捻度對清潔布清掃能力的影響。

sentences.english: Picks per inch is the number of weft threads per inch of woven fabric.
sentences.chinese: 每英寸緯密是每英寸編織物止鉤紗線的數量。

sentences.english: To measure tensile strength and breaking elongation of single yard.
sentences.chinese: 測定單根紗線的抗拉斷裂強力和斷裂伸長。

sentences.english: A new generation of electrically conductive yarns has been developed at Schsische Baumwollspinnerei GmbH, Venusberg.
sentences.chinese: 薩克森棉紡公司研製了新一代導電紗線。

definition: steel (as raw material)/steel sheets, bars, tubes, ingots, wire etc
to take off costume and makeup/bottom garment (trousers etc)
